testimonials.quote: So, so pleased with my eyelashes. I asked for the natural look, and that exactly what I got!! The salon is very friendly, made to feel welcome. I'll def be back

testimonials.quote: This is a great place. Iggy is friendly, professional and conscientious. I will be returning when I need more done. I would recommend this establishment to anyone.

testimonials.quote: This is a great place. It's clean and tidy. Iggy is polite, friendly and professional. I would recommend this to everyone.

testimonials.quote: I was impressed by Iggy. She has a friendly, polite and professional manner. The room was well equipped and very clean. I would happily recommend her services to friends and relatives.

testimonials.quote: This is my third time coming to Iggy for my brows and she smashes it every time! Her attention to detail is amazing, and immediately makes you feel so comfortable in her salon!

testimonials.quote: I had an amazing experience with Iggy! She were highly skilled and knowledgeable, and made me feel completely at ease throughout my treatment. The results were fantastic, and I couldn't be happier with how I look and feel.
